div.p:
The xiiij day of Decembre the yer' et cetera lxxiij comperit before the bailye alexander blindsel sit
tand in Jugement Robert prat and Duncan of lundoris quhilkis deponit be thare
athis that thai war by and for witnes tayn quhen thom sclugy depute
and ordanit Androw murray his factour and procuratoure til Ressave fra Wat thomson
foure merkis In the quhilkis he was adiugit and ordanit topay to the said thom
be sentence of arbitry that is tosay twa merkis now in hande and vthiris
twa markis betuix this and Witsonday next tocum et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvijo die Decembris anno Domini et cetera lxxiijo

quo die Rober
tus quhitson adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione xxti s' a Dauid mathei
prout compertum fuit per assisam et ad satisfaciendum eidem infra terminum Juris

The xxiiij day of Decembre the yere aboue writin . It is deliuerit and ordand be the aldirman
and hail consel in the tolbuthe of aberdene . that William mathoson seconde son til quhilum
Johne mathoson burges of this towne salbe deliuerit togiddre with all the gudis
pertenand til him til ser Johne of yet and til Dauid mathoson eftir the tenour of our
Soueran lordis lettres of tutoure testamentare dative gefin til the said Dauid mathoson
And the saidis ser Johne and Dauid mathoson has fundin Richard of Kyntor and Androw
scherar borowis and souertie for all the gudis that the saidis ser Johne and Dauid
Ressavis or sal ressaue belangand the said William that thai gudis salbe furth
cumand til the proffite of the forsaid barne quhen euir he cumis til laghfull eilde
and failyeand of him til his narrest frendis that has reson' thartoo And the
saidis ser Johne and Dauid ar oblist to freith the forsaid Richard and Androw be the
fathis of thare bodijs And incontinent the Aldirman and baillies sittand in Jugement
eftir that the borowis was fundin that the barnys gudis salbe furth cumand til
his proffite as said is chargit Alexander rede on our soueran lordis behalf todeliuer
the said barne togiddre with his gudis til the forsaidis ser Johne and Dauid mathoson
as he waulde answere tharefor before our soueran lord and his consel
Eodem die Andreas luss' in voluntate balliuorum pro perturbacione thome symson

Thomas symson et Willelmus murray convicti per assisam pro mutua perturbacione eorundem ipso
rum quilibet in amerciamento curie

Item dictus thomas symson adiudicatur in alio amerciamento pro perturbacione vxoris dicti Willelmi prout
Inuentum fuit per assisam

Item eodem die Willelmus murray et Duncanus smyth ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento curie pro mutua
perturbacione eorundem
Ellena sponsa Willelmi murraa in amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta thome symson in verbo et cetera

TheThis whole entry has been deleted. viii day of Januar' the yer' et cetera lxxiij twechand the debate betuix Dauid
meignes on theta part and Johne henrison on the tothir part

div.head:
Taxtores electi per totam communitatem ad taxandum centum libras concessas domino Regi et cetera
et Jurati in presencia tocius communitatis
div.p:
Ricardus de Kyntor
Johannes de marr
matheus fichet
andreas scherare
Robertus de culan
Dauid colison
Dauid symson
thomas prat

div.head:
Nomina auditorum compoti Andree scherar de officio suo prepositure annj pre
teriti videlicet lxxiij electorum et Juratorum
div.p:
Andreas alanson prepositus
Johannes de marr
Johannes Knollis
alexander blindsel
Dauid symson
Dauid colison
patricius badenagh'

Curia capitalis tenta per ballivos decimo die Januarij anno Domini et cetera lxxiijo quo die sectis
vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die thomas de marr' secundo die legitme vocatus ad sectam alexandri rede prout
continetur in acto precedenti Non comparuit quare precipitur sergeando et cetera Et quod premuniat
eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad tercium diem huius processus

Item eodem die processus illius tenementi prosecutus per patricium adamson Jacentis ad li sculhil
Respectuatur cum consensu parcium sub spe concordie vsque ad mensem proximum futurum diem videlicet
Juridicum statu et effectu quo nunc et cetera

Judicium processus thome de camera cuiusdam terre Jacentis ad capud vici castri continuatur
usque ad curiam capitalem post pascha proximo futuro

In curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vicesimo die Januarij anno quo supra Alexander howison
adiudicatur in tribus amerciamentis curie in vno videlicet pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis nory et in alio
pro iniusta detencione vnius duplicij siue dubleti vnius paris caligarum vnius pilij cum
liripippio a dicto Johanne et in tercio amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta alia vice Johannis nory
predicti in cimiterio ecclesie beati Nicholai huius burgj et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxiiijo die Januarij anno predicto quo die sectis
vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

div.head: Nomina assise
div.p:
Alexander de camera Ricardus de Kyntor Johannes de marr' matheus fichet Dauid
colison Dauid symson thomas symson alexander trail Alexander rede Johannes androson
Johannes vaus Johannes glenmalvyn Johannes Wormot henricus ruthirfurd Willelmus ma
lisson Adam de crafurde Robertus culan alexander howison Dauid meignes thomas
fiffe Dauid mathoson gilbertus de camera thomas prat

Eodem die actio cuiusdam plegij mota per alexandrum rede contra et aduersus thomam marr
continuatur statu et effectu quibus nunc cum consensu parcium vsque ad diem veneris proximo
futuro absque preiudicio alicuius parcium

Die xxviijo mensis Januarij anno et cetera lxxiijo Johannes grig ex gracia prepositi et con
silij concessa Willelmo lowson vicino huius ville Receptus fuit in liberum bur
gensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi prestito solito iuramento Et dedit dictum
Willelmum louson pro ter plegium pro terra distringibili habenda in burgo pro amerciamentis regiis
infra annum et diem

Item eodem die predicta actio plegij mota inter dictos alexandrum rede et thomam de
marr continuatur vsque ad crastinum propter debilitatem curie Et dictus thomas omnino
dissentit ad continuacionem dicti plegij protestando quod quicquid posterius fac
tum fuerit in huiusmodi causa non cedat sibi in preiudicium Juris sui ex quo paratus
est ad subeundum wardam et deliberacionem plegij alias porrecti

In curia ballivorum tenta xxixo die Januarij Actio plegij mota inter alexandrum
rede et thomam de marr' et decisio warde eiusdem Respectuatur vsque ad
diem lune proximo futuro propter debilitatem curie

Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio septimo die mensis februarij anni predictorum
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

add.foreign: dominus David vaus et g morison

div.p:
The quhilk day ser Dauid Vaus chaplan and procuratour of Sanct
mary magdalenis altar in the parisch kirk of this burgh comperit
before the aldirman and baillies sittand in Jugement schavand to thaim
how he had Recoverit the propertee and possessione of a land liand
in the greyn betuix the land of Thom Keig on the southe part
and the land of the ayris of vmquhile thom cran on the northe
part in defaute of payment of xj s' and viii d' of annuale acht
to the said altar and lang tyme vnpaijt et cetera And that he has superce
dit eftir yer' and day now bypast eftir the leding of four'
processis and that he had gottyn Jugement tharapon / to see gif ony
person' waulde pay the said annuel Runnyn tharapon vnpaijt of
before And becaus' that thare has cummyn na persone sen syne
til him topay the said annuel as said is and tofreith the said land
the said ser Dauid has made protestacione in fourme of law
and opinly protestit / that fra thyne furth . na person be herd
in the contrar' of the laghfull process' and Recovering of the properte and possession'
of the said lande bot that he may frely dispone tharapon to the proffite and
vtilitee of the said altar and the payment of the annuel forsaid et cetera
And incontinent the said ser Dauid has set the said land with the pertinentis in
few ferme til gilbert morison burges of aberdene and his ayris perpetua
ly payand til the said ser Dauid and his successouris chaplanys til the
said altar yerly the aid annuel of xj s' and viii d' lely and treuly
but fraude or gile witnes the hail court

The said day It is deliuerit be ane assise that Robert blindsel sal broyk
his watir quhilk Thomas of chavmer had ij yeris before / for this
yeris fisching tocum for the quhilk watir the said Robert sal pay to
the said thomas aucht hamburgh barellis of salmond gude and suffisant
and the said thomas sal pay the wattir mail the baillies

Item the same day Johne symson tailyour gravntit in Jugement that certane arbi
trouris chosyn betuix him and henry poilson had ordand the said henry
tocontent and pay to the said Johne xxvj s' vj d' and quhilk the said henry gravntit
topay him thankfully / And the said henry has tayn toprefe this
day xv dais with suffisant preif that the said Johnis clame of twa
hattis and all vthir clamys and debatis betuix thame was endit and
concludit be certane arbitrouris

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus ductis per patricium adamson filium et heredem
quondam Willelmi adamson burgensis de abirdene et per Angusium iohneson prelocutorem
dicti patricij super Recuperacione possessionis et proprietatis vnius terre Jacentis
apud scule hil inter terram Jacobi crag ex parte orientali et terram Andree sche
rar' ex parte occidentali defectu solucionis quindecim solidorum dicto patricio tanquam
heredi dicti quondam Willelmi debitorum annuatim et a longis temporibus non solutorum
vnde dictus patricius cum suo prelocutore Andrea scherar' secundum formam suorum proces
suum pecierunt a ballivis Juris et Justicie complementum Tunc curia deligenter
auisata decreuit quod dictus patricius possessionem et proprietatem terre ante
rioris nunc vaste dicti tenementi defectu solucionis xv s' annuatim legittime recuper
auit et hoc pro Judicio fuit datum per os Willelmi serra Judicatoris dicte
curie teste curia et cetera

The nynt day of februar' the yer of god et cetera lxxiij Comperit before
gilbert the vaus ane of the baillies of aberdene In the tolbuthe thom of
mar made protestacione that the twenty schillingis of annuel aucht til
Johne mathisonnis ayris oute of his land quhilk is saulde til
Alexander rede liand in the galowgate apon the eist syde of the sam
gate betuix the land of Edmond lowson on the southe syde
and the land of quhilum Johne mathison on the north syde
quhilk annuel of xxti s' is nocht expremit in the said alexandris chartir
made til him be the said thomas sulde nocht turne til the said
thomas in preiudice in tyme tocum et cetera

Item the said day Alexander rede in presence of the said bailye is becumin
borch til thomas of chavmer ane of the bailliez for foure hamburgh
barrellis of salmond gude and suffisant for Robert blindsel
burges of aberdene tobe paijt til the said thomas or his assignais
at the feist of Saint Johne the baptist next tocum or within xv
dais thareftir lely and treuly but fraude or gile . And the
said Robert blindsel is oblist be his hande tokepe the said
alexander rede scaithles of borowgang that he has dravyn
him til thomas of chavmer of the said iiii barellis of salmond before
thir witnessis Johne Wode thom of marr' and Adam of Knollis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vndecimo die februarij anno predicto

quo die Walterus
thomson in amerciamento per confessionem propriam pro iniusta perturbacione cristiane symson ipsam' super
buccam percuciendo et emendabit ad visum proborum

Ricardus hil convictus fuit per assisam pro iniusta prosecucione certorum pellium a Roberto
gray / et dictus Robertus quietus per assisam de calumpnia predicta / quare idem
Ricardus in amerciamento curie et cetera

Eodem die Jacobus craik et Dauid bog ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro mutua perturbacione
et emendabit alter altri

Item the same day Simon Jacobson has tane to prefe at this next Rais'
in flandris that a pund gret and iii g' of flandris money clamit be
Cristy litstar tobeawand be him / that the said Simon has paijt and
content the said some' til loyk laris on the said cristijs behalf And failye
and tharof the said Symon tobe dettour of the said some and topay it
til him or his factouris beyond sey at this same Rais'

Item eodem die Alexander fynlaw adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione octo solidorum a Dauid hil
prout compertum fuit per assisam quam summam satisfaciet eidem infra terminum Juris Et dictus
Dauid in amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta eiusdem alexandri et cetera
Johannes gregory cum, Agneta baxtar, quilibet in amerciamento pro mutua perturbacione vt compertum fuit per assisam

Johannes symson scissor convictus fuit per assisam de iniusta inquietacione et vexacione Johannis
chapman iunioris eundem prosequendo in curia spirituali super actione mota inter eosdem cum eadem
causa determinari potest et debet coram ballivis huius ville et ideo in amerciamento curie et cetera

The said day before Alexander blindsel and gilbert the Vaus twa of the baillies sittand
in Jugement in presence of the hail court Gilbert morison is oblist be his hande and
becumin borgh til thomas of chavmer for foure hamburgh barellis of salmond gude and
suffisant for Robert blinsel burges of abirdene tobe paijt to the said thomas or his
assignais at the fest of saint Johne the baptist in mydsummyr next tocum or
within xv dais thareftir lely and treuly but fraude or gile

Item the same day Androw atkyn comperand before the Aldirman and baillies in Jugement
has bundyn and oblist him til pay and content til William the hay burges of this
toune twa hamburgh barellis of salmond gude and suffisant be the
fest of Saint Johne the baptist in mydsummyr next tocum for the sowme of
foure pundis of vsuale money / quhilk he come law borgh and was
ordand him tilhafe paijt to the said William be the baillies anent William of
Kyntor as is contenit in ane act gangand before / quhilkis ij barellis of salmond
he gravntis him topay to the said William hay as said is withoute ony mare
Impediment obstakle or demaunde
Curia balliuorum tenta xiiijo die mensis et anni predictorum

quo die Alexander de camera
in via nauium in absencia philippi Dunbrek electus fuit per prepositum et quosdem de
consilio in officium sergeandi qui prestitit debitum et solitum iuramentum ad fideliter
deseruiandum in dicto officio vsque ad exoneracionem eiusdem et cetera

Eodem die Johannes Wormot comparens coram ballivis asseruit quod premunitus erat per
alexandrum blindsel vnum ballivorum ad respondendum magno Wormot hodie tanquam peremptorie
super certis debitis secundum tenorem litterarum Regis per eundem magnum dicto ballivo presen
tato offerendo ipsum in presencia dicti magnj ad respondendum et Juri subeundum secundum tenorem
earundem litterarum Regiarum / et quia dictus magnus recusauit prosecucionem eiusdem iohannis
vt prescribitur in presenti curia / dictus Johannes extendit plegium in manu
Johannis Vaus vnius sergeandorum quod quitus fuit a calumpnia dicti magni
quousque nouiter fuerit citatus et premunitus

Item eodem die Agnes baxtar convictus fuit per assisam de amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
loky law et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum

Johannes Wormot inuenit plegium legalem cristinum litstar quod magnus Wormot erit
indempnis de eodem aliter quam per viam Juris Et Alexander rede deuenit similiter ple
gius pro dicto magno de indempnitate ipsius Johannis Wormot
Curia ballivorum tenta xvto die februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxiijo

quo die Jacobus
futhes textor in amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta mariote commorantis domo
cum dicto Jacobo de qua perturbacione posuit se in voluntate ballivorum et emendabit eedem
et iniungitur eidem pro emenda ad dandum dimediam libram cere ad missam sancti sanguinis et
ij s' dicte muliere

Eodem die Johannes hill inuenit Ricardum hil plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate
cristini litstar aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus cristinus dedit Johannem Wode
similiter plegium pro ipso de indempnitate eiusdem Johannis et cetera

Actio inter Simonem iacobson et Willelmum moyses Respectuatur per ballivos propter debi
litatem curie vsque in crastinum diem

Curia legalis ballivorum de Aberdene tenta xxjo die februarii anno predicto
quo die curia affirmata et sectis vocatis absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Ricardus de Kyntor prelocutor Andree lammyntone porrexit plegium
in manu Johannis Vaus vnius sergeandorum super Johannem lammyntone tunc presentem
quod idem Johannes iniuste detinet vnam ollam eream a dicto andrea ex quo
dictus andreas offerebat soluere et deliberare eidem viii s' debitos super eandem
vnde dictus Johannes pecijt a ballivis diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio qui
sibi conceditur hodie ad octo dies se dies ipsa iuridica fuerit alioquin
proxima die iuridica inde sequente ad peremptorie respondendum in dicta causa

Elena quhite et Agnes sponsa Willelmi cowpar convicte sunt per assisam videlicet ipsarum
quelibet in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione adinuicem et emendabunt sibi inuicem et cetera
Item eodem die Moricius talyour in amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta Jacobi nevison

Item eodem die wardatum fuit per curiam et datum pro iudicio per os Willelmi serra Judicatoris
dicte curie quod plegium extensum per Johannem symson aduersus henricum poilson asserendo
quod deuenit ad causam et clameum suum de duobus pilijs lane agnine et ijbus vlnis cum
quartario panni lati linei fuit validum pro eo quod dictus henricus manucepit probare cum sufficienti
probacione in presenti curia de re finita per arbitros vt patet in vltima curia legali precedenti
et defecit in sua probacione / Et quia prefatus henricus dictum plegium in ipsius presencia porrectum
non recontrariavit / dictus Johannes extendit aliud plegium quod primarium plegium in omnibus erat valoris
defectu regracionis et cetera wardatum fuit per curiam / et dictus henricus condempnatus in predictis
rebus vna cum amerciamento curie in defectu dicte probacionis

The last day of februar' the yere of god et cetera lxxiij In presence of the baillies sittand in
Jugement . James clerk is becumin souertie and borch for henry mortimar burges of
aberdene for the some' of xxxv s' and a Ryng of siluer weyand ane vnce and
a quartar of vnce tobe deliuerit til Marione of gillespy the dochtir of quhilum
Johne of gillespy or til hir ayris or assignais quhat tyme that scho cum til
laghfull age

The same day the said henry mortimar is oblist be the faith of his body his ayris
executoris assignais for to freith the forsaid James clerk his ayris executouris
and assignais of the forsaid xxxv s' and the Ryng and toreleve him tharof of all
clamys of ony party and tokepe thame scathles tharof as law wil

Item eodem die wardatum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os Willelmi serra Judicatoris curie
quod plegium porrectum per Ricardum Kyntor nomine et ex parte Andree lammyntone in manibus
Johanni vaus vnius seriandorum asserendo dictum Andream deuenisse ad causam et clameum
suum de vna olla erea aduersus Johannem lammynton secundum tenorem acti precedentis causa
non defensa est valida ex eo quod dictus andreas ostendebat ballivis viij s' et ad redimendum
huiusmodi ollam dicto Johanni soluere / et non comparuit tanquam in termino peremptorio sibi as
signato / quare adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et ad satisfaciendum prefato andree dictam ollam
prout de Jure tenetur teste curia et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta primo de marcij anno predicto

quo die Alexander archar et Johannes nory
convicti per assisam de iniusta perturbacione adinuicem verbotenus ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur
in amerciamento curie et emendabunt adinuicem

Eodem die Nicholaus liel posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de perturbacione iniusta
et lesione alexandri archer et emendabit parti lese ad visum proborum

Item the same day Johne of glenmalin accusit be the aldirman and consel for gret
sclanderous' langage and defamyng spokin be him of the personis that set and
war chosyn apon thetax of this toune be the consent of the hail communite has
put him in wil of the said aldirman and consel to stande at the ordinance of thaim
tharupon and til amende in alsfer as he has trespassit / for the quhilk
todo thai hafe assignit til him before thame on friday next tocum tocomper'

In curia ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio secundo die marcij anno Domini et cetera lxxiijo
patricius smyth posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de iniusta peturbacione alexandri fynlaij et dictus
alexander quitus ab omni perturbacione dicti patricij / et pro emenda assisa deliberauit
quod dictus patricius dabit die dominica proximo futuro vnam libram cere ad missam sancti
sanguinis

Curia legalis ballivorum burgi de aberdene tenta in pretorio vijo die mensis et anni predictorum
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

The same day thomas symson burges of this burgh comperand before the aldir
man and baillies presentit to thame the kingis lettres vndir his signet besekand
thame throu verteu of thare officez tomak thare tobe deuly execut
eftir the tenour of the same the quhilk lettrez the forsaidis aldirman and bailliez
gert be opinly red in presence of the hail court . sayand til him that thai war
redy and soulde fulfil the tenour of thaim in sa fer as thai couth get knaulege
of the personis awing til him certane soumez of money as was contenit in
the saidis lettres Apon the quhilkis the said thomas gafe ane bil to the bailye
alexander blindsel before androw alanson aldirman and thomas of chavmer ane of the
bailliez and becaus' the personis war nocht than present nor mocht nocht be gettyn
for the tyme thai ordand thame tobe warnit til the said thomas chalance
to morne et cetera

Eodem die Johannes horne primo die legitime vocatus ad sectam Willelmi Dog ad
respondendum plegio super eundem porrecto pro iniusta intromissione cum vna vacca
dicti Willelmi Non comparuit quare precipitur seriando quod capiat districtum ab eodem et cetera
et ad premuniendum eundem ad proximam curiam legalem

The viii day of marche the yere aboue writin Richard of Kyntor Androw sche
rar Dauid colison and thom of marr' amicabill compositouris betuix Dauid
blabre and Johne clerk anentis the clame of fyve pundis and xl d' clamit
be the said Dauy tobe awand til him be the said Johne clerk / the
forsaidis compositouris has deliuerit endit and decretit that the said Johne clerk
sal pay and content til the forsaid Dauy within viij daijs eftir the date
of this writ foure merkis of the vsual payment of scotland and he sal
pay within xv dais eftir paisk next tocum fifty schillingis / and for
the payment of the forsaidis soumez tobe made as before is expremit
the forsaid Johne clerk has fundin borowis Androw Rettre and alexander
sanquhar coniunctlie and seueraly
